p: Sachets are made of aromatic herbs. For those who have not been infected with the virus but have been exposed, the most simple and effective method of TCM prevention is by the traditional aromatherapy method with herbs such as Atractylodes lanceolata, Phellodendron amurense, and Artemisia argyi, which have a significant preventive effect ( Liang et al., 2003). In addition, the herbs can be made into a sachet to “avoid poisonous gas” ( Zhang et al., 2020; Zhang et al., 2003), which is an important principle in TCM ( Liu, 2003).
